page.title: 03TRADE IN MIDHURST
page.content: Midhurst is a thriving centre with a wide range of shops catering for the needs of inhabitants and holiday visitors.Local needs are well served by small local businesses and 3 chain stores.In recent years new shop accommodation has been available in single units and in indoor markets.Many new shops,which are mainly very specialist,have survived only a few months suggesting that there is insufficient custom to support more shops.A monthly market functions at the Grange Centre.A wide variety of stall-holders come,many from outside the area, selling mainly fancy goods and bric-a-brac.Local people and visitors complain that goods,especially fresh food,are very expensive compared with nearby towns and it is difficult to buy cheap clothes for teenagers locally.
